casebody.data:
The State, ex rel. Fant, Appellant, v. Flaherty, Dir. of Administrative Services, Appellee.

[Cite as State, ex rel. Fant, v. Flaherty (1990), 48 Ohio St. 3d 39.]

(No. 89-1167 Submitted November 14, 1989 Decided January 10, 1990.) Henry J. Fant, pro se. Anthony J. Celebrezze, Jr., attorney general, and Lorraine M. Nestor, for appellee.

For the reasons set forth in its decision of May 25,1989, the judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed.

Sweeney, Holmes, Douglas, Wright, H. Brown and Resnick, JJ., concur. Moyer, C.J., not participating.
